mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C##NUMBERONE.REPLY ( REG_ID, REPLY_CONTENTS, PARENT_REPLY, BOARD_NO, REG_DT, MOD_DT, REPLY_LEVEL, NICK_NAME ) VALUES ( #{regId}, #{replyContents}, #{parentReply}, #{boardNo}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{replyLevel}, #{nickName} )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO as replyNo, BOARD_NO as boardNo, REG_ID as regId, NICK_NAME as nickName, REPLY_CONTENTS as replyContents, PARENT_REPLY as parentReply, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as regDt, TO_CHAR(MOD_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as modDt FROM C##NUMBERONE.REPLY WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE C##NUMBERONE.REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENTS = #{replyContents}, PARENT_REPLY = #{parentReply}, MOD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(reply_no) AS replyNo FROM reply
